comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Cucuracha, Spanish for "cockroach."

LOC -- your title has misplaced the comma.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of January 17, 1914 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9B02E4DC1730E733A... reports, "CUCARACHA SLIDE MOVING.; 1,500,000 Cubic Yards of Soil Still to be Removed." and talked about dredges working to get the canal open. The first transit of the canal was in August 1914.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to both of you for the clarification.  We'll make the correction to the caption title next time we update the record.
